name: part_011
file: tmp_【 3D LIVE 】豪華ゲスト & 生演奏 & 告知あり！ #博衣こより生誕Live2025 -FIRST STEP- 【博衣こより⧸ホロライブ】 [ERIxQaoEbXs]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_011.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song 'Our Bright Parade' (Hololive IDOL PROJECT cover version).
Announcement section where Koyori talks about her 1st album and trending on social media.

subtitles.original: パレパレパレ 探しに行く
subtitles.english: Parade, parade, parade, let's go search.

subtitles.original: スタートは何遍だって
subtitles.english: The start is any number of times.

subtitles.original: ただ 独り言呟いた
subtitles.english: Just muttered a monologue.

subtitles.original: ただ 始まりたくて走った
subtitles.english: Just wanted to start, so I ran.

subtitles.original: 遠く暗がりに灯った
subtitles.english: Lit up in the distant darkness.

subtitles.original: それは眩しすぎた名前
subtitles.english: That was a name too dazzling.

subtitles.original: それは優しすぎる思い出
subtitles.english: Those were memories too kind.

subtitles.original: もっと 近づけと手を伸ばした
subtitles.english: I reached out to get closer.

subtitles.original: 重なり合うはず結び合った
subtitles.english: Supposed to overlap, we tied together.

subtitles.original: ほら 今 内緒は 僕らになった
subtitles.english: Look, now the secret became us.

subtitles.original: パレパレパレ 輝くんだよ
subtitles.english: Parade, parade, parade, it's shining.

subtitles.original: 悔しさも愛おしさも連れておいで
subtitles.english: Bring both regret and preciousness along.

subtitles.original: 風 夢 羽 飛び立つさ
subtitles.english: Wind, dreams, wings, we'll fly away.

subtitles.original: ささやかな祈り光 終わりなき始まり
subtitles.english: Modest prayer and light, an endless beginning.

subtitles.original: 君を見つけたこと 胸を張れるよ
subtitles.english: I can be proud of finding you.

subtitles.original: ここから これから Our Bright Parade Parade
subtitles.english: From here, from now on, Our Bright Parade Parade.

subtitles.original: まだ 頼りない予感を
subtitles.english: An as-yet unreliable premonition.

subtitles.original: 歌おう 恥ずかしくなんてないよ
subtitles.english: Let's sing; there's nothing to be ashamed of.

subtitles.original: 誰も解けない魔法に
subtitles.english: A magic no one can unravel.

subtitles.original: いつか また巡り会わしたい
subtitles.english: I want to meet it again someday.

subtitles.original: あの日 ゼロに始まったストーリー
subtitles.english: A story that started from zero that day.

subtitles.original: 数えきれない言の葉
subtitles.english: Countless words.

subtitles.original: 数えるような思いじゃないさ
subtitles.english: Not the kind of feelings you can count.

subtitles.original: ほら 今 僕らを ひとつと呼ぼう
subtitles.english: Look, now let's call us one.

subtitles.original: パレパレパレ 美しいんだよ
subtitles.english: Parade, parade, parade, it's beautiful.

subtitles.original: ゆらしあえる切なさ 夜はきらめく
subtitles.english: Sorrow we can share, the night sparkles.

subtitles.original: ハレハレハレ 窓の外
subtitles.english: Sunny, sunny, sunny, outside the window.

subtitles.original: 相応しい旅路とは 君と歩くことさ
subtitles.english: The journey that suits us is walking with you.

subtitles.original: 君と歩くことなんだ
subtitles.english: It's walking with you.

subtitles.original: 「ただいま」も聞けば
subtitles.english: If I hear 'I'm home,'

subtitles.original: 「おかえり」って叫ぶよ
subtitles.english: I'll shout 'Welcome back.'

subtitles.original: 当たり前じゃないか
subtitles.english: Isn't it obvious?

subtitles.original: パレパレパレ 輝くんだよ
subtitles.english: Parade, parade, parade, it's shining.

subtitles.original: 暗闇を満たすのは 君だ僕だ
subtitles.english: It's you and me filling the darkness.

subtitles.original: パレパレパレ 輝くんだよ
subtitles.english: Parade, parade, parade, it's shining.

subtitles.original: 悔しさも愛おしさも連れておいで
subtitles.english: Bring both regret and preciousness along.

subtitles.original: 風 夢 羽 飛び立つさ
subtitles.english: Wind, dreams, wings, we'll fly away.

subtitles.original: ささやかな祈り光 終わりなき始まり
subtitles.english: Modest prayer and light, an endless beginning.

subtitles.original: 君と飛び込んでゆく 素敵なスタートさ
subtitles.english: I'll dive in with you; it's a wonderful start.

subtitles.original: ここから これから Our Bright Parade Parade
subtitles.english: From here, from now on, Our Bright Parade Parade.

subtitles.original: 告知パートー！
subtitles.english: Announcement section!

subtitles.original: え、この告知のあとにもまだ歌うので、
subtitles.english: Eh, I'll still be singing after these announcements, so...

subtitles.original: チャンネルはそのままで最後まで見てってください！
subtitles.english: Stay on the channel and watch until the end!

subtitles.original: そして、トレンド入りもありがとう！
subtitles.english: Also, thank you for making us trend!

subtitles.original: なんだかご縁のありそうな方のホームランがすごいです。おめでとうございます！
subtitles.english: The home runs from someone who seems to have a connection are amazing. Congratulations!

subtitles.original: トレンドもありがとうね！
subtitles.english: Thank you for the trend, too!

subtitles.original: そしてですね、この告知パート、最後の方に
subtitles.english: And then, in this announcement section, towards the end...

subtitles.original: こよの配信史上最大の告知もありますので、最後まで見てってください！
subtitles.english: There's the biggest announcement in Koyo's streaming history, so please watch until the end!

subtitles.original: ではまず一つ目は冒頭でも言っていたこちら！
subtitles.english: Now, for the first one, it's this, which I mentioned at the beginning!

subtitles.original: 博衣こより 1st Album ダウンロード版は0時から販売開始されております！
subtitles.english: Hakui Koyori's 1st Album digital version has been on sale since midnight!

subtitles.original: 概要欄からすでに飛べますのでゲットしてください。1位とかもありがとう！
subtitles.english: You can already access it from the description, so please get it. Thank you for reaching 1st place and such!

subtitles.original: そしてですね、限定ボーナストラック、はい！はい！はい！はい！こんこよOPが入っているCD...
subtitles.english: And then, the limited bonus track, yes! Yes! Yes! Yes! The CD containing the Kon-Koyo OP...
